author: Pon Vasanth Arunachalam
text:
P. Veeramalai (28), a native of Vathipatti near Natham in Dindigul district, was found dead in a poultry farm at Poochampatti near Vadipatti here on Saturday.

Police said that he had come along with his wife and two children three months ago to work in the farm run by a Madurai-based man. The family was residing in the farm. On Friday evening, three men came to meet him allegedly to consume liquor. Hence, he dropped his wife V. Karthika (24) and her children at a relative’s place. When Karthika went to the farm on Saturday morning, she found him dead, police said, adding it looked like the suspects strangulated him.
title: Man found dead
